0.name: Kageuchi - Break
0.effect: Everytime lightning damage is dealt, increase lightning damage by 5%, last for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times, triggering it again will refresh the duration. Gain 10% extra damage after releasing ultimate, last for 10 seconds, triggering it again will refresh the duration.

1.name: Sirius
1.effect: Increase all damage by 5%. When destroying balls, accumulate energy based on the number of balls destroyed. At 50 energy, summon Sirius for 45 seconds. CD: 60s

2.name: Red Sakura
2.effect: Gain 2% increase in physical damage for every orb consumed for 4s, stackable up to 10 times. Gain 1 additional sword wave orb in sword wave mode, CD: 10s

3.name: Red Lotus Fanatic
3.effect: 10% damage increase to basic attacks. Every basic attack increases physical damage by 5% for 2s, stackable up to 5 times

4.name: Zero-Degree Target
4.effect: The skill 空间领主 deals 10% more damage, increase physical damage by 15% after a 3 orb skill for 5s

5.name: Wolf Eater
5.effect: All damage increases by 20% when attacking enemies within the burning area

6.name: God Giver
6.effect: 10% damage increase to allies within 5m of range for every 12 orbs you consume. Deal 10% more damage to rooted enemies

7.name: Sky Wind Dragon
7.effect: Basic attacks have a 10% chance to weaken enemies decreasing their damage by 10% for 5s. 10% chance to recover an orb when attacking weakened enemies, CD: 6s

8.name: Type Zero
8.effect: Damage of 激光炮伤害 is increased by 50%. Increase damage by 15% after using a 3 orb skill for 5s

9.name: Ramiel
9.effect: 15% increase to ultimate damage. Increase physical damage received by enemies by 2% everytime your ultimate hits them for 5s, stackable up to 8 times

10.name: Chimera - Break
10.effect: 20% chance to cause target to enter damaged status when attacking, dealing 2% of physical damage every second for 3s, stackable up to 10 times. Chances are double on enemies with defense down. 10% increase to physical damage when attacking damaged enemies

11.name: Verve
11.effect: 10% chance to decrease enemy's fire resistance by 5% when attacking, CD: 8s for each enemy. Fire damage increased by 20% after ultimate and doubles the chance of decreasing enemy's fire resistance

12.name: Big Kamui
12.effect: Increase physical damage by 15%. Next skill damage is increased by 30% when you successfully counter an enemy

13.name: Pitch Black
13.effect: 20% increase to physical damage and dark damage by 20% after consuming 3 orbs, lasts for 5s

14.name: Frenzy Fusion Cannon
14.effect: Increase physical damage by 10%. After consuming 3 orbs at once, basic attacks damage is increased by 30%

15.name: Nuclear Dragon
15.effect: Increase fire damage by 10%. When consuming a red orb, fire damage increases by 10% for 5s

16.name: Soul Slayer
16.effect: When you deal a crit from behind, the target is Damaged, receiving 50% physical damage every second for 3s. When attacking damaged enemies, physical damage increases by 20%

17.name: Kuji No Ken
17.effect: Attacks have a 20% chance of causing lightning strike, dealing 50% physical damage, CD: 3s

18.name: Shadow Violet
18.effect: After consecutive red, blue, and yellow orb consumption for 5s, increase all damage by 15% for 5s

19.name: Guardian Mount
19.effect: Obtain a random orb for increasing your combo by 30, CD: 8s

20.name: Saker E-3320
20.effect: Critical chance and Critical damage increases by 10% when there are no enemies within 2m

21.name: Tourmaline Fire
21.effect: 30% chance to cause defense break while attacking, decrease defense by 5% for 3s, stackable up to 5 times

22.name: Star Of Bethlehem
22.effect: Create a christmas halo when you do a 3 orb combo. Attack and movement speed is increased by 8% within the halo. The halo lasts for 15s, CD: 30s

23.name: Accel Greatsword
23.effect: Attacks have a 10% chance to release a shockwave, dealing 100% physical damage to enemies within range

24.name: Pillar Of Lava
24.effect: Damage is increased by 12% after consuming 3 orbs at once for 4s

25.name: Heartstone
25.effect: After consecutive 3 orb combo, 15% increase to all damage for 5s

26.name: Red Firework
26.effect: Create explosions at target's location when dealing damage in canon mode or fire mode, dealing a total of 250% of physical damage, 10 seconds cooldown

27.name: Lantern Night
27.effect: When dealing damage to an enemy, 20% chance to drop a lantern that deals 15% physical damage. 1 second cooldown.

28.name: Faded
28.effect: All damage increases by 10% for 4 seconds after releasing QTE or 3 orbs

29.name: Violet Wu
29.effect:
Passive 1: When dealing damage to shielded enemies, increase all damage by 2%. Stacks 3 times and lasts for 5 seconds.
Passive 2: When you break an enemy's shield, stun the target for 2 seconds. This effect has a 10 seconds cooldown on each affected enemy.
Passive III: After releasing Colorflow's core passive, increase all physical damage done by 15%. Lasts for 7 seconds

30.name: Suzume
30.effect:
Passive 1: All damage done is increased by 10%.
Passive 2: When in resonance form, all dark damage done is increased by 10%

31.name: Dominator
31.effect:
Passive 1: All damage increases by 3% for every energy orb you pick up, stacks up to 5 times.
Passive 2: After picking up 5 energy orbs, gain 1 extra skill orb and 10 energy, 10 seconds cooldown.

32.name: Lightning
32.effect:
Passive 1: 15% lightning damage increase.
Passive 2: Trigger a lightning strike after dealing lightning damage using skills 5 times on a single target, dealing 150% lightning damage, 2 seconds cooldown.

33.name: Saint Elmo
33.effect:
Passive 1: 10% more lightning damage
Passive 2: When in Flash mode, decrease the amount of normal attacks required to trigger core passive by 2.

34.name: Julia
34.effect:
Passive 1: 15% increase in ice damage.
Passive 2: 10% increase in all damage after a 3 orb combo, last for 5 seconds.

35.name: Thanatos
35.effect:
Passive I: 15% additional damage increase.
Passive II: When Camu is in Berserker mode, Thanatos will grant 10% dark damage increase to all allies on field.

36.name: Sariel
36.effect:
Passive I: 15% dark damage increase
Passive II: When attacking, there is a 15% chance to create a dark shockwave, dealing 75% dark damage, 0.5 seconds cooldown.

37.name: Gungnir
37.effect: When dealing damage, decrease target's physical defense by 20%, lasts for 8 seconds, triggering the effect again will refresh the duration. When dealing damage with a small/medium/wide railgun, inflict a bleed onto target for 8 seconds, dealing physical damage based on 25/50/100% of your attack damage.

38.name: Qing Hyuk
38.effect:
Passive 1: 20% physical damage increase.
Passive 2: Peafowl's attack rate is increased by 50% and Peafowl gains a new skill: **Curse**.
**Curse**: Peafowl morphs into an amulet that sticks onto its targets, dealing up to 420% physical damage. After a short delay, it explodes and deal 480% physical damage. The damage increases with Qu's ultimate level.

39.name: Baji
39.effect:
Passive 1: 15% ice damage increase.
Passive 2: After releasing QTE or ORAORAORA, an ice mirror will form beneath of Chang Yu that lasts for 8 seconds.
